name: Libra: The Glorious Distribution
description:
Libra: The Glorious Distribution Balance this World

As the Emissary of Libra, you are tasked to keep this world in balance.  There exists three aspects you must keep in check: Creation, Stability, and Destruction.  The world must have all three, but must not have too much or too little.

Each action taken shifts this balance, and it is up to you to keep things in check.

How to Play

The game is played entirely with the mouse.  Click on a card to play it, and it will modify the aspects of creation, stability, and destruction.  Ensure that you do not exceed 9 or fall below 1 on any aspect- doing so will cause the game to end.  After using up the cards in your deck, you will be given a choice of three cards to add to your deck.  Select one, and it will be shuffled into your deck along with your discard pile.  Survive as long as possible to achieve a high score.

When you play a card that results in all three aspects having the same value, you get a boost in score!  Green stars will appear when hovering over a card that will make the aspects the same.

After collecting your 13th card, the aspects will become unstable.  This is indicated by a (+1) or (-1) below the aspect.  An unstable aspect will lose or gain 1 for each card you play.
